import React from "react"; import "./intro.css"; import Me from "../../image/1630784845657.jpeg"; const Intro = () => { return (

Hello, My name is

Karmugil Kalaiyarasan Kavitha

Full-Stack Developer
Web Developer
Blockchain Developer
Software Test Engineer

I develop Full-Stack web applications having responsive web pages. Also I design the Databases in such a way that the front end communicates with the DB efficiently using custom APIs which are build from scratch.

); }; export default Intro;
